body: Hi Mostapha and Chris, The new energy balance component is great for understanding the various sources of heat gains and losses! I wonder if we can add an additional output "total building energy consumption" for this component because it took me a while and several components to make this happen (see part of the workflow in the GH file attached.) So, I made a copy of your energy balance code and added a few new lines using your original code as a template. Now we can output and plot this variable using bar chart.  Pls see if this is useful and necessary. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/nkLEPVQ6s9cvH6mG55JomCGjRS3X3J4haNeBDfDo*jXHHfYre94PRQg9hygxIW1jFvLZpKz-5u-Mb2nQ3q1D3qvtNjwUF*Ns/01.PNG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/nkLEPVQ6s9esl10S7i4ZMru6aRxo6wj8ynSj5BKWxp1FovWzjnp8CBTnrBCEHujH4H02Ueg7EDHQEwyAquxGAFPzNp3ZqkOT/02.PNG)
topic: add a "total building energy consumption" output for the "energy balance" component?

[http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=NENEN&fork=hydra...](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=NENEN&fork=hydra&id=Energy_Balance)
